item.title: Sum of Elements solution...
item.dc:creator: Victor Goff
item.content:encoded:
Well, it has been a while since I have personally blogged on this...
I wanted to put something up that I found interesting, or of some use.
I hope someone comments on this and argues with me about the 'wisdom' of perfoming this in this manner.
module Enumerable  def sum_of_elements    inject{|sum, element| sum + element}  endend collection = ('a'..'f')puts collection.sum_of_elements
